quote-source: Among other things he left out ofÂ his famous poem,Â William Carlos WilliamsÂ failed to give us any details about the kitchen in which he ate plums. AtÂ The Toast,Â Mallory OrtbergÂ rewrites the poemÂ so it takes place in a communal dorm kitchen. (via millionsmillions)
quote-text:
This is just to say
to whoever ate the plums
in the icebox
you could have just asked me if you could have one
my name was on the box
and i donât have a meal plan
that was literally all i had to eat for the weekend and I was saving them for breakfast
so i hope you enjoyed them i guess
next time just ask
